name: Estelaroid: Escape Room
description:
You are in a spaceship, alone. And your ship is dangerously close to a black hole. What were you doing there? What happened to the crew?

Estelaroid is a science fiction-themed escape room that will put your brain to the test, subjecting it to a wide variety of puzzles that you'll have to solve to discover the mysteries that surround the ship. Decipher the riddles, discover new rooms and try to repair it to survive.



Your ship is getting closer to the black hole. Will you be able to solve the mysteries?

Features

  • Solve the puzzles
  • Discover new rooms and Items
  • Find out the mysteries that surround your ship
